TopicTitle: Minmus viewed from the surface of the Mun!

Articles.Content:
Wow. What a rare thing I just saw. After crashing my rover and being a simple command pod (terrain is glitchy), I noticed a bright white dot in the sky. I looked at my orbital map and proved it... it is Minmus!

> ![index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13110.0;attach=21075;image](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13110.0;attach=21075;image)

Here is the orbital map view.

> ![index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13110.0;attach=21077;image](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13110.0;attach=21077;image)

> ![index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13110.0;attach=21079;image](http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=13110.0;attach=21079;image)

If you have any photos like these, please feel free to share them.
I love these shots of Minmus in the sky. I cannot wait for other planets and objects. I hope the future observatory allows us to see further.

> 
> I love these shots of Minmus in the sky. I cannot wait for other planets and objects. I hope the future observatory allows us to see further.

It probably will allow us to view the surface.... (Unless the planet/moon is like Titan.)
